  1. Just successfully bundled @eleven_ty using esbuild with help from @eduardoboucas ! This is a huge step for Eleventy Serverless bundles, capped by AWS Lambda at 50MB. The baseline bundle (after zip) dropped from 16.5MB to 625KB (with all template language libraries) 🎉
